result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Igihe habonetse intsinzi y’Imana Allah ugatsinda ababangikanyamana mu Bakorayishi, ugaheza ugahabuza igisagara ca Makka;

result.arabic_text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
result.translation: Ukabona n’abantu binjira mw’idini ry’Imana Allah ry’ubwislamu ari benshi mu migwimigwi;

result.arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
result.translation: Aho rero, uraca witegurira kurengutswa n’Imana Allah, uheze uninahaze ushimagize Imana yawe Rurema Allah, wongere uyisabe kenshi ikigongwe. Mu vy’ukuri, Yo Yamye Yumvira cane abigaya.
